description.value:
This steel shield is painted a mottled crimson, and it always glistens as if wet. Its crest is composed of eight appendages that curl around each other, resembling the swirling tentacles of a giant kraken. Two ferocious eyes sit in its center, gleaming with an inner light.

Hardness HP BT
16 96 48

Activate 2 Raise a Shield

Frequency once per hour

Effect You unleash the kraken's wrath. You Raise the Shield. The shield's appendages briefly extend to impossible length as they wriggle and lash out at your foes, dealing @Damage[10d10[bludgeoning]|traits:area-damage] damage to all enemies in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true|name:Kraken's Guard Tentacle Attack|traits:uncommon] save). The shield remains animated for 1 minute, during which you can use it to Grapple a creature within 10 feet of you without needing a free hand. When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Athletics check.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Kraken's Guard]
